meanings.definition: A four-wheeled horse-drawn carriage with a retractable hood.
meanings.sent1: The clarence rolled smoothly down the cobblestone street.
meanings.sent2: We took a ride in the clarence to enjoy the fresh air.
meanings.sent3: The horse pulling the clarence seemed to be in a hurry!
meanings.sent4: The clarence glided through the park like a graceful swan.
meanings.sent5: The elegant clarence was the highlight of the parade.

meanings.sent1: Clarence is a popular name for boys in our town.
meanings.sent3: Clarence always makes me smile when I hear it.
meanings.sent4: When I hear the name Clarence, I think of kindness.
meanings.sent5: Clarence sounds strong and friendly as a name.
